video.title: El Clon
video.synopsis: Religion thwarted Lucas and Jade's young love. They reunite decades later, but Jade's heart is torn between the man she knew and his younger clone.

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Albieri posits the theory of cloning. Leonardo argues with his children. Diego sleeps with Cristina, unaware she’s with his father.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Jade doesn’t get what she did wrong. Alí slaps her. Diego asks Cristina to leave his father. Said and Latiffa get engaged. Jade sees Lucas at Alí’s.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Alí and Albieri discuss their beliefs. Jade and Lucas meet. Latiffa wants Said, but Nazira proves it’s impossible. The two weddings take place.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Latiffa have a bad reaction to the engagements. Diego ignores Jade, who cries. Lucas explains. Leonardo beats Diego and kicks Cristina out.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jade kisses Lucas and says Sidi has wedding plans. Diego gets set up at Albieri’s house, but he has to go back for some things and runs into Cristina.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Diego demands Leonardo choose between him and Cristina. Jade is still a prisoner in her room. Lucas is caught in a sandstorm. Diego has an accident.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jade tries to persuade Said she’s defective. Rosa recognizes Diego’s body. Some Arab men attend to Lucas. Leonardo finds out about Diego’s death.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo remembers his fight with Diego and lashes out at Cristina. Alí cries over Diego. Nazira doubts Jade’s virginity, and Said demands proof.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Lucas make love. Said gives Jade a jewel. Lucas arrives and Alí introduces them. Dora and Osvaldo agree to an in vitro fertilization.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Alí orders Latiffa and Jade to prove their virginity. Jade dances for Lucas. Alí orders Latiffa to live with Jade. Albieri proposes to Luisa.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Lucas promises Jade he’ll find support for them. Latiffa and Mohamed get married. Albieri tells Lucas about Diego’s death. Leonardo rejects Cristina.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Lucas argues with his father about Diego’s death. Jade writes a letter to her uncle saying she’s not getting married. Marisa is scared to see Lucas.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Rosa tells Marisa Lucas is Diego’s twin. Lucas asks Albieri to help Jade, but he refuses. Jade confronts Mohamed. Said inherits 15 women.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Cristina are friends. Latiffa is frightened to see Jade so in love. Nazira gives Alí Jade’s letter. Albieri marries Luisa.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Alí reads Jade’s letter and kicks Zoraida out. Leonardo thinks there’s something between Cristina and Lucas. Dora and Lucas meet in Albieri’s office.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: With Dora’s eggs and the samples from Lucas, Albieri can create a clone. Alí tells Jade she’s not marrying Said or Lucas. Nazira sees Jade escape.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Latiffa leaves Nazira with Jade, making it hard for her to see Lucas. Marisa hits on Lucas. Albieri comes to stop them implanting the clone in Dora.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Albieri begs forgiveness in the church. Said finds out Jade is in love and asks Abdul to punish Lucas. Nazira knows it and tries to stop the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Cristina offers Jade and Lucas a place to stay. Marisa doesn’t let Lucas leave on time. Alí realizes and takes Jade to Morocco. Lucas is too late.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Lucas travels to Morocco to stop Jade’s wedding. Leonardo looks for him, and Marisa is obsessed with him. Dora confirms to Albieri she’s pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Said finds out Jade isn’t a virgin but keeps it quiet. Albieri regrets the clone growing in Dora. Lucas dresses up as Diego to confront his father.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Lucas proposes to Marisa to get over Jade. Leonardo approves of the union. Jade wants to escape. Said tries to make her happy and win her affection.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Jade finds out Lucas is engaged and calls him. Rosa lies to help Marisa. While in labor, Dora calls for Albieri. Leonardo will never forget Cristina.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: The baby is born, and Dora is surprised that he’s white. Albieri doesn’t know whether to tell anyone he’s produced the first human clone.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Albieri won’t let anyone see Dora’s son. Jade and Nazira face off, but Jade remembers her purpose and calms down. Osvaldo wants Dora out of his life.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Dora is desperate because Albieri has her son. Jade hears Lucas is coming and sells everything so she can flee, but she runs into him at the market.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Lucas meet and make love, and Jade asks him to run away with her. Lucas confronts Marisa and says he loves Jade. Zoraida tells Alí Jade fled.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Alí’s men catch Jade. Lucas shows up late. Jade invents a story that Abdul doesn’t believe. Alí defends her, saying the witnesses didn’t see anything.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Said threatens to kill Lucas. Jade swears to Allah if he saves his life, she’ll give him up. Said lets him go. Luisa thinks Daniel is Albieri’s son.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Jade wants a divorce from Said. Marisa announces her pregnancy. Dora tries to keep Albeiro’s temper under control. Nazira is with Latiffa for Osvaldo.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Jade wants a divorce, but Said refuses. Lucas confronts Leonardo when Marisa comes in and announces she’s pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Jade finds out about Marisa’s pregnancy. Said and Jade argue, and she burns the photos of Lucas. Cristina argues with Albieri about Daniel’s party.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Jade tries to get Said to marry Manu. Nazira won’t return until she’s married. Mohamed meets Osvaldo. Luisa suspects Albieri is Daniel’s father.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Albieri lies to Luisa about the implanted egg. Marisa goes into labor early. Osvaldo flees when Mohamed says how much he has to pay to marry Nazira.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Nazira wants Said to divorce Jade, but he refuses and takes a photo of Lucas and the baby. Marisa finds Jade’s necklace and thinks it’s for her.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Albieri lies and convinces Dora to go to Los Angeles. Jade tries to escape, and Zoraida helps. Cristina plans to use Leonardo’s money for revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Jade tries to flee but can’t get away. Zoraida thinks Jade is gone and decides not to return to the house. Dora says she’s traveling without Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Said hasn’t forgotten Jade. She dances for him and they spend the night together. Jade tells a story and avoids the whip. Marisa wears the necklace.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Cristina looks for Leonardo after Armando scams her. Jade convinces Said to try to have a baby. Daniel wants to be with Albieri, not with Dora.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Cristina helps Jade and Lucas meet up, but they won’t be able to be together. Daniel ignores Dora; he just wants to be with Albieri.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Marisa sells the necklace. Natalia, friends with Daniel, looks at photos of Diego and sees Daniel. Nazira finds out Jade takes herbal birth control.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Natalia sees that Lucas and Daniel have the same mark. Rosa thinks Natalia is dreaming with Diego. Lucas argues with Marisa and agrees to a divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: After his rescue, Daniel runs to hug Albieri. Dora decides to send him to New York. Jade writes Nazira as Osvaldo. Rosa has photos of Diego and Lisa.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Said has Jade take fine textiles to market. She takes advantage of the trip to see Alí. Said divorces Jade, but there’s a baby on the way.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Said promises Jade he’ll take her baby away. Jade runs but not far. Daniel never forgave Dora for separating him from Albieri. Latiffa has a boy.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Said forgives Jade. Dora returns to Miami. Khadija dances. Amín has bad friendships. Natalia is timid. Albieri’s secret comes to light.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Dora tells Albieri Daniel is looking for him. Khadija dreams of Alí and Nazira’s wedding. Leonardo contacts Said for a building project in Miami.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Said’s business dealings may have Lucas and Jade crossing paths. Lucas finds out Jade is his mother. Dora knows Daniel is looking for her.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is bitter. Marisa is spending. Mohamed feels guilty. Samira wants freedom. Jade asks Said not to take her. Daniel sounds like Lucas to Albieri.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Alicia finds Albieri’s journal with his notes on the cloning. Cristina finds Leonardo and Sofía. Latiffa tells Jade she saw Lucas with another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Albieri finds his day planner. Marisa tells Lucas the truth. Lucas confronts Leonardo for preferring Diego. Said finds out Lucas is Leonardo’s son.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Albieri tells Lucas he saw Jade. Alejandro is Natalia’s chauffeur. Cristina seduces Leonardo, and Sofía notices. The two end up in a hotel.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo organizes a family reunion. Jade and Lucas see each other after 12 years. Samira wants to hide her menstruation to be a Westerner.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Jade exchange glances. Said notices his wife’s attitude. Marisa knows who Jade is and humiliates her as she wonders what could have been.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Marisa defies Lucas to accept the Arabs’ invitation. Said is enchanted with Marisa. Natalia is heartbroken to see Fernando kissing a dancer.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Lucas meet and kiss. Marisa seduces Said for revenge. Alicia runs into trouble at Albieri’s clinic. The lawyers have the clinic under siege.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Jade spend the night together. Said has a bad feeling. Jade doesn’t want to leave Marisa and Said alone together. Natalia likes Alejandro.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Lucas wants to leave everything for Jade, but she gets scared and decides to return. Jade and Marisa argue over Lucas. Marisa flirts with Said.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is determined to win Jade back. Leonardo is afraid of losing his business with Said. Rosa calls Dr. Albieri.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Marisa finds out Lucas is after Jade and has a nervous breakdown. Natalia throws herself into the street and into harm’s way. Lucas and Jade meet.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Lucas approaches Jade and takes her to the ruins, where they remember their adolescence. Jade wants to run away with Lucas no matter what happens.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Natalia and Alejandro are still together. Jade decides to run away with Lucas. Said interrogates her and discovers her intentions.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Said catches Jade. She fears Lucas will be harmed. Natalia prepares to introduce Alejandro to her family. Roberto says hello to Alejandro.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Enrique gets sick from the drink Said prepared for Lucas to get back at Jade for not loving him. Lucas has a bad feeling and decides to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Marisa isn’t happy with Natalia’s boyfriend and forbids her from seeing him. Leonardo supports the couple to avoid the mistake he made with Lucas.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Lucas want to run away together. Said prepares his revenge. Natalia returns to Alejandro. Dora ignores Nazira and asks Osvaldo to move in.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is still in the hospital. Said returns to Miami to meet with Marisa. Leonardo welcomes Alejandro and gives the relationship his blessing.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Marisa gives Lucas a cold reception, still receiving gifts from Said. Natalia talks with Lucas about Alejandro. Nazira wants a wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Marisa tells Lucas about Said’s gifts. Lucas welcomes Alejandro, and Natalia is happy. Nazira and Abdul want Mohamed to take a second wife.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Everything’s ready for Said and Rania’s wedding. Said wants to embarrass Jade, but all she can think about is Lucas. Nazira offers Amina to Mohamed.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Said starts a new life with Rania. Jade is happy that Said has gotten his second wife and now she can get a divorce. Latiffa is desperate over Nazira.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Daniel confronts Dora and says Osvaldo is the father. Albieri can’t find Daniel. Said wants to travel with his two wives but also get back at Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Daniel doesn’t think Osvaldo is his father. Dora doesn’t want Albieri anywhere near Daniel. Estela demands Albieri reveal who Daniel’s father is.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Albieri doesn’t tell Estela who Daniel’s father is. Jade is locked up in Miami. She doesn’t know Rania’s jealous. Said makes a deal with Lucas Ferrer.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Marisa offends Lucas and Natalia’s boyfriend. Said forces Jade to dance for Marisa. Marisa is shocked and humiliated. Luisa explodes in Alicia’s face.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Luisa is jealous of Alicia and wants Albieri to fire her. Leonardo takes Natalia with him to get work for Alejandro. Lucas wants to know about Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Escobar moves in with Alicia and takes the money. Jade escapes and goes to the Ferrers’, but Lucas isn’t there. Alí agrees to help her, but just her.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Said realizes Jade is gone. Mohamed says she’s at his house. Daniel gets in such a big fight with Dora that Estela lies and says Albieri’s his father.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Said meet with Alí and Abdul and decide to get a divorce. Zoraida tells Lucas. Marisa lies that Alejandro stole it. Lucas files for divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Dora argue again, and she agrees to let her see Albieri, who sees his adult clone for the first time. Daniel thinks Albieri is his father.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Daniel packs up to move in with Albieri. Leonardo finds out Cristina is all right and withdraws his help. Marisa is still against Alejandro.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: The police call Alejandro in to question him about the necklace. Natalia is suspicious of her mother. Jade convinces Latiffa to loan her the cellular.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Albieri convinces Daniel he can’t go to his house. Jade sends a burka to Lucas so he can visit her. Mohamed has Samira examined.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Lucas enters Said’s house dressed as a woman, Yamile. Abdul says he’s taking Yamile. Marisa leaves the necklace in Alejandro’s car and calls the cops.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro is arrested. Natalia smokes marijuana. Lucas and Jade wake up together. Rania wants to meet Yamile. Latiffa tries to convince Mohamed.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Natalia admits she stole the necklace and she’s smoking marijuana again. Albieri just wants to be with Daniel. Luisa thinks Alicia’s blackmailing him.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Natalia confesses how she feels about her family, especially her mother. Alejandro looks for a place to live with Natalia.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Said, Marisa and Jade face off. Alejandro takes Natalia home. Luisa thinks Albieri has another woman. Albieri proposes a trip to Morocco to Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Khadija is determined to separate Said from Rania. She doesn’t get why Jade doesn’t love Said. She dances for Said, and Rania’s furious with jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Said go to the mall, and she runs off to see Lucas. Said finds Latiffa’s cell phone. Albieri tells Osvaldo that Daniel isn’t his son.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Luisa hires a detective to follow Albieri. Said kisses Marisa in front of Lucas’s friend. Said uses Khadija to threaten Jade. Jade wants Rania’s help.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Jade tells Rania she loves another and asks Lucas to take her away. Albieri confesses to Father Andrés what he did. Dora realizes Luis knows nothing.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Luisa is confused by Albieri’s reaction when Daniel arrives. Said won’t let Jade see Khadija. Zoraida calls Lucas. Marisa costs Alejandro his job.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Lucas explains to Zoraida why she can’t take Khadija, and Jade finds out. The girl recognizes Lucas and tells Said. Fed up, Marisa goes to a hotel.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Luisa demands Albieri let her see Daniel. He asks what she’d think about a human clone. Lucas meets Daniel. Marisa separates Natalia and Alejandro.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Jade calls Lucas to ask him to leave her alone and faces off with Marisa. He decides to clear the air. Natalia has a cocaine problem.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro asks Marisa to leave him alone. Lucas and Jade confront Lucas for not taking Khadija. Rania, Nazira and Khadija see Said kissing Marisa.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Khadija is sick but Said won’t let Jade see her. Abdul signs a letter to leave Morocco. Escobar says Alicia is pregnant. Albieri spoils Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Jade manages to leave the country and arrives in Miami to see her daughter. Mohamed asks Said to forget Jade, but he can’t get her out of his heart.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Jade begs to see her daughter. Nazira lets her in and the girl improves. Daniel has an encounter with Cristina. Alicia leaves with Clara’s truck.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Alí decides to hand Lucas over to Jade. Said changes his mind about the divorce. Alí asks the family for advice. Marisa tries to talk with Natalia.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Rania threatens to turn Said in for lack of faith. Marisa asks Said to give Alejandro his job back. Jade begs Alí not to allow Said’s marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Albieri tries to kill himself. Alejandro distrusts Marisa and refuses the job. Natalia isn’t happy. Daniel hides in the church. Said calls on Lucas.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Said insists on staying with Jade. Khadija is happy, but Rania is crying. Natalia is taking drugs. Albieri gives Daniel tickets to Morocco.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Zein agrees to marry Jade. Alicia wants to separate Pablo from Cristina. Jade feigns illness. Rania lies for her, but Said finds out.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Said calls Jade and Rania, and just as he’s about to scold Rania for the third time, Jade confronts him. Said says she can say goodbye to Khadija.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Said locks Jade up. Albieri prepares for his trip to Morocco. Luisa confuses Daniel with Lucas. Marisa and Leonardo don’t think Natalia’s using drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Alí wants to see Jade, but Said refuses. Albieri asks Luisa for some time, but she fears the worst. Samira is in love. Mohamed fears being like Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Said obeys Alí and opens up to Jade, who rejects her fate. Rania says Jade plans on taking Khadija. Lucas wants Jade, and Marisa wants revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Albieri reveals the truth about Dora to Daniel. Jade and Rania fight. Rania finds out she’s pregnant, and Jade sees her chance to divorce Said.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Jade talks with Lucas, who leaves for Morocco to find her. Said finds out and confronts her. Daniel and Albieri also arrive in Morocco.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Rania fight. Rania accuses her of wanting her to lose the baby. Said kicks Jade out. Gloria tells Rosa that Natalia is taking drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Clara tries to tell Escobar about Fernando’s addiction. Jade is happy about her wedding. Lucas tells Cristina the plan, and she supports it.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Natalia is arrested for buying drugs. Marisa bails her out and they argue. Jade has married Zein and awaits her chance to escape. Alejandro wins.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Jade tries to distract Zein to slip him the sleeping pills, but he notices. Lucas waits for her until dawn.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Zein is seduced by Jade’s dance, and he decides to imprison her until she falls in love with him. Alejandro confronts Natalia. Lucas returns to Miami.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Zein’s not giving Jade back to Said. He swears she’ll never see Khadija. Jade thinks she’s free with him. Marisa can’t stand to see Natalia like this.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Lucas finds out Natalia is still using drugs and asks Marisa for a truce. Alí discovers Daniel. Albieri tells him Daniel is Lucas’s clone.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Alí doesn’t think Albieri has defied Allah, but he defends himself from a scientific standpoint. Daniel loves the place. Lucas postpones the plan.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Jade and Daniel meet. She’s impressed. Daniel swears she’s the woman of his dreams. Natalia falls asleep high. Albieri introduces Daniel and Luisa.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Alí finds out the truth about the Clone and feels guilty for betraying Allah. Zoraida thinks the end of days is at hand. Jade gives up on Lucas.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Natalia disappears. Daniel tells Cristina he’s Dora and Leonardo’s son. Cristina thinks she’s been betrayed. Luisa tells Albieri to reveal the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Jade looks to Lucas to fulfill his promise. Khadija is disappointed to find out Jade isn’t coming back and that Rania abandoned them for a Westerner.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Jade asks Zein to take her daughter, but he refuses. Jade flees and gets run over. Zein takes her to the hospital. Latiffa blames Lucas for it all.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Jade doesn’t want to see Lucas in the hospital. Mohamed confronts Zein for his disrespect. Said sends for Jade’s things, but Khadija stops him.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Silvia sees that the insemination material is complete. Cristina takes Daniel to see Leonardo, who’s shocked. Lucas and Marisa ask Natalia to return.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo cries and calls Daniel his son, but he doesn’t understand. Cristina fights with Dora for sleeping with Leonardo, and the two end up in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Dora want to have a chat with Leonardo. Dora is surprised to see Lucas. Albieri tells the father Daniel is a clone. Khadija hates Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Dora decide to confront Albieri, who tells Daniel the truth. Jade sends a letter to Khadija, but she’s not interested.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Gloria asks Natalia to let Alejandro progress. Leonardo doesn’t assign his new son’s case to Enrique. Escobar isn’t suspicious of Alicia’s intentions.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Escobar asks Alicia for the deed to the apartment. Khadija rejects Jade. Jade decides to return to Said to be close to Khadija.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Jade asks Zein for a divorce to get Khadija back. Natalia is still doing drugs. Silvia tells Julio that Albieri made a clone of Lucas.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Said rejects Jade, and she turns to Alí. Albieri creates another clone. Andrés’s father explains to Daniel the nature of his relationship with Dora.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Lucas tries to talk with Jade about her daughter, but Latiffa won’t let him. Dora demands an explanation from Leonardo for saying they had an affair.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: At the Ferrer mansion, Albieri has some explaining to do. He confesses that Daniel is a clone and explains how he was born without Dora’s blood.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Daniel finds pics of Diego. Dora tells Estela what he is. Alejandro doesn’t know what to do about Natalia’s drug use. Marisa is shocked to see Daniel.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Silvia explains the insemination to Dora. Zein asks Jade to be his bride. Alí says she has no other choice.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Alicia uses the papers. Jade isn’t sure whether to go with Alí or Zein and wants to talk with Khadija. Samira tells Latiffa she’s with Carlos.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Khadija tells Rania Jade is coming back. Albieri tells Daniel how he was created. Daniel runs off in pain and not knowing what to do.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo wants to claim Daniel as his son and Albieri as his property. Daniel thinks about dying. Said rejects Jade again. Alicia manipulates Escobar.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Khadija asks Said about her mother. Jade meets with Daniel. Pablo tells Alejandro Natalia is hurting him. Daniel never wants to see Albieri again.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Jade discusses Daniel with Albieri. She hopes he has more courage than Lucas. Leonardo and Dora fight over Daniel. Leonardo plans to take it to court.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Alí notices Daniel has the same interest in Jade that Lucas did 20 years ago. Khadija wants Jade at home, but Said sets some conditions.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Natalia is in debt. The Jíbaros take her hostage and tell Alejandro they’ll hurt her. Leonardo apologizes to Cristina and begs for a second chance.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Said and Rania have a boy, and Khadija cries. Alejandro tells Marisa he doesn’t have the money, and they’re going to go rescue Natalia together.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro can’t handle Natalia’s addiction. Zein serenades Jade. Lucas goes to Jade, who thinks it’s Zein and tells him she’s over Lucas.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Daniel goes to Morocco to marry Jade. Khadija is jealous of the baby and insults him. Said sees that Khadija is sad and promises to bring Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Marisa and Lucas catch Natalia trying to rob the mansion. Zoraida tells Jade Daniel and Said are going to Morocco. Rania swears Jade won’t return.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Natalia threatens to kill herself, and Lucas decides to take her to a clinic. Daniel arrives as the ambulance is taking Natalia and tries to flee.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Lucas goes to Dora’s and realizes they have similar tastes. Leonardo tries to get Albieri to testify that Daniel is his son. Said goes to Morocco.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Jade gives Said a warm welcome, unaware that Daniel is nearby and swore not to leave until she’s his bride. Marisa takes Natalia shopping. She steals.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Lucas confronts Albieri about the clone. Natalia is back on drugs and robs Clara’s house. Jade returns to Said.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: Rania sees Daniel and attacks Jade. Said is upset about Jade’s trickery. Leonardo gives Cristina the engagement ring; he doesn’t intend to let her go.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Alicia gives the order to keep Escobar out. Jade and Daniel meet. Amín says Samira is menstruating; Mohamed is overjoyed thinking she’ll wear a veil.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: Lucas wants to go to Morocco, but Natalia’s arrival stops him. Rania confronts Zoraida. Alí catches Daniel and Jade kissing and demands Jade choose.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Alí reprimands Jade. At night, he talks to Said and asks him not to marry Jade. Said thinks it’s a good idea. Daniel waits for Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: Clara looks for Fernando, but Paula says he’s been arrested. Lucas tries to change his appearance. Daniel is disappointed he can’t be with Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: Rania tries to humiliate Jade, but Khadija won’t allow it and puts Said on her mother’s side. Daniel asks Albieri not to make his origin public.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: Daniel goes to Lucas and tells him everything that happened with Jade in Morocco. Rosa tells Daniel Lucas and Jade’s love story, and he understands.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Lucas tells Cristina what happened between Jade and the clone. Cristina tries to understand Daniel doesn’t want Jade back. She still thinks about it.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Natalia loses her baby. Marisa forbids Rosa from taking messages from Alejandro. Samira helps Latiffa reach Mohamed. Mohamed wants to get married.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Albieri only thinks of his ego and Leonardo of the case; no one of Daniel. Natalia likes her 20-year-old dad. Said asks Nazira to control the women.
episodes.title: Episode 162

episodes.synopsis: Jade confronts Lucas for the past, but when Lucas asks about Daniel, she runs away. Abdul insists Mohamed get married.
episodes.title: Episode 163

episodes.synopsis: Natalia takes drugs and attacks Marisa. Latiffa and Jade pawn Mohamed’s gold to get to Morocco. Mohamed regrets the second wife, but it’s too late.
episodes.title: Episode 164

episodes.synopsis: Natalia returns home. Lucas reprimands her. Natalia says she prefers the clone. Latiffa wants to stop Mohamed and Zuleika’s wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 165

episodes.synopsis: Latiffa looks for Alí to have a word with him. Mohamed faints in front of Zuleika. Latiffa asks Alí for a pass to leave the country and free Mohamed.
episodes.title: Episode 166

episodes.synopsis: Jade confronts Lucas for abandoning her. Marisa calls Lucas with a crisis concerning Natalia. Natalia plans to rob the Ferrer mansion.
episodes.title: Episode 167

episodes.synopsis: Mohamed apologizes to Latiffa. Khadija plans to take Munir to Latiffa and tells Jade she’s on her own. Jade dances, and Said can’t resist.
episodes.title: Episode 168

episodes.synopsis: Daniel plays guitar. Lucas remembers he always wanted to be a musician and offers to pay for classes for him. Jade dances for Said.
episodes.title: Episode 169

episodes.synopsis: Three thieves enter the Ferrer mansion and force Marisa to open the safe. Lucas is arrested when Natalia robs a shopping mall.
episodes.title: Episode 170

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is assaulted and calls the police. One of the thieves is caught and rats out Natalia. The detective won’t allow Lucas to withdraw the charges.
episodes.title: Episode 171

episodes.synopsis: Alí and Nazira put a wrench in the works for Mohamed’s engagement saying they had the same wet nurse. Rania wants advice; she thinks Said favors Jade.
episodes.title: Episode 172

episodes.synopsis: Rania exposes Said and Jade’s mistreatment. Alí suggests Said rethink marrying Jade. Rania isn’t happy with the decision. Jade is up for anything.
episodes.title: Episode 173

episodes.synopsis: Said announces he’ll take Jade back, but she says she doesn’t agree and leaves. On the street, Jade runs into Daniel and thinks it’s destiny.
episodes.title: Episode 174

episodes.synopsis: Daniel gives Jade a place to stay and asks her to marry him. Jade sees he’s different. Latiffa and Zoraida are overjoyed and visit her.
episodes.title: Episode 175

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo assures the judge Daniel is Lucas’s clone. Dora tells all, from the day she opted for artificial insemination at Albieri’s clinic until now.
episodes.title: Episode 176

episodes.synopsis: At the paternity trial, Lucas says he wants nothing to do with Daniel. When asked if he wants to remove Dora from the birth certificate, he says no.
episodes.title: Episode 177

episodes.synopsis: Marisa asks Alejandro to return to Natalia. Said tells Zein that Jade is free. Daniel and Lucas fight. Jade asks them to calm down and runs away.
episodes.title: Episode 178

episodes.synopsis: Luisa tells Dr. Villegas that Albieri made a clone. Rania argues with Khadija. Zein gives Jade two weeks to decide whether she wants to marry him.
episodes.title: Episode 179

episodes.synopsis: Natalia recognizes the boy’s condition is due to the drugs she took. Jade picks up Khadija at school. Villegas tells Albieri human cloning is illegal.
episodes.title: Episode 180

episodes.synopsis: Samira runs away from home. Daniel says he’s going with Jade. Khadija goes with her mother. Daniel asks Leonardo for a ticket to Morocco.
episodes.title: Episode 181

episodes.synopsis: Said finds out Khadija ran with her mother. The judge tells Fernando to go into rehab. Marisa tells Lucas to go after Jade and be happy.
episodes.title: Episode 182

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo wins the trial. Nazira tells Latiffa about Pablo. Said finds Jade, but Khadija asks her father not to hurt her. Alí proposes to Zoraida.
episodes.title: Episode 183
